overview: Peter is staying at the hotel, all at the expense of his employers. Every month heâ€™s here with a small group of colleagues, away from home, his girlfriend and family. But the night away is all he needs to help try and discard the internal conflicts within that scare him, which he tries to remedy by secretly meeting up with random guys off the internet for one night stands, all the while living in paranoia that a work colleague will have seen him in the process.
title: Pete and Aaron
